original_text: It was right that God should bring Jesus back to heaven as king. All things belong to God, and he causes all things to continue. God wanted many people to become his children. He wanted them to live with him in heaven. Jesus made this possible because he died with much pain as a sacrifice. It was right that God should bring Jesus back to heaven as king. korean_text: 그러므로 만물이 그를 위하고 또한 그로 말미암은 이가 많은 아들들을 이끌어 영광에 들어가게 하시는 일에 그들의 구원의 창시자를 고난을 통하여 온전하게 하심이 합당하도다

sentences.original_text: It was right that God should bring Jesus back to heaven as king.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 예수님을 왕으로 하늘에 다시 데려가시는 것이 옳았습니다.

sentences.original_text: and he causes all things to continue.
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 모든 것을 계속 존재하게 하십니다.

sentences.original_text: God wanted many people to become his children.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 많은 사람들이 그의 자녀가 되기를 원하셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: He wanted them to live with him in heaven.
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 그들이 하늘에서 자신과 함께 살기를 원하셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: Jesus made this possible because he died with much pain as a sacrifice.
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 희생으로 고통 속에서 죽으심으로 이것을 가능하게 했습니다.
